title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1226.3 - Changes to the text of the 2020 PMCNYS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1226.3 - Changes to the text of the 2020 PMCNYS
State Regulations

For the purposes of applying the 2020 PMCNYS in this State, the 2020 PMCNYS shall be deemed to be amended in the manner specified in this
section. (a) 2020 PMCNYS Section
404 Occupancy Limitations. Section 404 of the 2020 PMCNYS shall be deemed to be
amended to add the following Section 404.9 to read as follows: 404.9 Tiny Houses. The provisions of Section 404 shall not
apply to tiny houses constructed in accordance with the Residential Code of New

York State and Appendix Q of the Residential Code of New York State. (b) 2020 PMCNYS Chapter 8

Referenced Standards. The entry in Chapter 8 of the 2020 PMCNYS for the
publication entitled "Performance Specifications for Safety Covers and Labeling

Requirements for All Covers for Swimming Pools, Spas and Hot Tubs" in the list
of referenced standards published by ASTM International (ASTM) shall be deemed
to be amended to read as follows: F1346-91 (2018): Standard Performance Specification for

Safety Covers and Labeling Requirements for All Covers for Swimming Pools, Spas
and Hot Tubs. (Section of this document that references this standard: 303.3). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
1226.3

Amended

New

York State Register April 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 16, eff. 4/19/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
